title: Unranked Support main looking for a duo partner or team
body:
Just finished University and will have alot of free time over the next year, I am keen to start playing league alot more and getting serious into ranked. 

random info:
- 20 years old
- from Victoria, Aus
- main Support (and I'm rather dam good at it)
- Lanes in order of how good I am at them   Support > Mid > Top > JG > ADC
- Never had time to properly get into ranked, always just played a random ranked game every once in a while (I play alot of normals) and usually only got past placement
- Take things pretty serious (in all modes) most of the time, still have fun and try not to flame whenever possible when playing ranked.
- can take criticism well and take all comments into consideration (best way to improve IMO)
-  happy to use coms, prefer Teamspeak (have own server if needed) but also fine with no coms for duo.
- I don't really mind the level of the team, if I find people I like to play with them I'm happy. But would prefer it to be people that are trying to get better at the game and rise through ranks, who are looking to hone their teamwork skills and other stuff like that.
- Top 5 favorite champs are {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:111}} 

Feel free to send me a friend request to play some normals to test how I play (or just go right into ranked if you feel like it).

Username: XxSneakyBeakyxX (Obviously not a serious name :v )

replies.body: adc main. reached d5 last season currently maining jungle on my dia account have a gold account which i want to climb to plat + and want to do it duo adcing again so i stay ontop of my adc game.
I'll throw ya an add this afternoon :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hey there,

I main ADC and was S1 on NA server last season but stopped playing after they moved server to chicago giving me >220 ping.  Just created an acc in OCE and getting it to lv8 (for the damn flash).  If it goes right I'll move one of my lv30 accounts to OCE. So what about try to play couple normal games and see how it goes? :)

Just added you in-game.
